718738f-b.title: Manhattan: Cherry Street - Montgomery Street
718738f-b.text:
(1)
333-331 Cherry Street, (rear view) south side, between Montgomery
and Clinton Streets. The passageway was formerly occupied by No. 335 a
warehouse.
March 23, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
A view showing mainly No. 333, and the afore mentioned clearance.
March 23, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
718738f-b.folder: Cherry Street & Montgomery Street, Manhattan, NY

718741f-c.title: Manhattan: Cherry Street - Montgomery Street
718741f-c.text:
Cherry Street, east from Montgomery Street. Views 2 d 3
are of the same area several aonths later and show the absence
of a 5 story tenement appearing at the left of the earlier
view. This is a white structure and bore No. 378.
View No. 3 is in the same direction from a point slightly
above Montgomery Street and across same. Note the East Side
mothers taking advantage of the Spring sun to air their babies.
No. 1 April 25, 1939
2 \& 3 June 23, 1939
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
718741f-c.folder: Cherry Street & Montgomery Street, Manhattan, NY

718739f-a.title: Manhattan: Cherry Street - Montgomery Street
718739f-a.text:
(1)
Cherry Street, east from Montgomery Street.
March 30, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same, at a later date, showing the playground at the rear of
Public School No. 31; situated at the S.W. corner of Monroe and
Gouverneur Streets.
March 22, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

724280f-a.title: Manhattan: Water Street - Montgomery Street
724280f-a.text:
Water Street, s.e. cor. Montgomery Street.
P. L. Sperr, photographer
Juuly 3, 1940
Neg. No. A-1092
724280f-a.folder: Water Street & Montgomery Street, Manhattan, NY

724278f-a.title: Manhattan: Water Street - Montgomery Street
724278f-a.text:
(1)
Water Street, at and adjoining the N.W. corner of Montgomery
Street. (Direction of Water Street is arbitrarily set to run east
and west).
March 30, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
The same,Water Street,North West corner of Montgomery St.from
South East corner of Water St.
April 23rd,I939
P.L.Sperr,
.NO REPRODUCTIONS.

718740f-a.title: Manhattan: Cherry Street - Montgomery Street
718740f-a.text:
Cherry Street, south side, west from Montgomery Street. Note the
vacant lot (No. 335), adjoining the 1-story white building.
March 22, 1937.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
(2)
A later view of the same area and :howing further
demolition of buildings beyond the aforementioned white garage,
No. 339. The lower portion of this block was formerly developed
as the Seventh Ward Athletic Field and is just beyond the 83-story
structures. Upon demolition of buildings,this was included.
June 1, 1939
L. Snerr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
718740f-a.folder: Cherry Street & Montgomery Street, Manhattan, NY
